Articles.Content: I did a search and no one else seems to be having this problem. But, i'm right clicking parts in the VAB and i'm not seeing any autostrut options, on anything; engines, SRB's command capsules, nothing. Did I miss something or did Squad remove them?
You need to enable Advanced Tweakables in the options menu to have access to autostruts. Though that was already the case in 1.2.
Thank you, that's all it was.

1 hour ago, ItsSeanBroleson said:

I did a search and no one else seems to be having this problem. But, i'm right clicking parts in the VAB and i'm not seeing any autostrut options, on anything; engines, SRB's command capsules, nothing. Did I miss something or did Squad remove them?

You also have to get the tech node with struts in it.
